title: These College Kids Are Biking for 6 Straight Days to Keep Cyclists and Pedestrians Safe
content:
A fraternity at the University of Colorado and the Magnus White charity are raising $100,000 to protect cyclists and pedestrians from distracted drivers

Read the full article at These College Kids Are Biking for 6 Straight Days to Keep Cyclists and Pedestrians Safe on Velo.
author: Outside Online
